name: Beat Slicer (itch)
description:
made in python with the ursina engine

osu! themed game, but instead of clicking circles, you slice them

functions:

 - playing

 - mapping

keybinds can be edited in the keybinds folder

run (run.bat) to play

how to play:

 - slice circles (hold left mouse and drag, although if you hold for too long without slicing a single beat, the slice will end and you will have to release and click again)

 - map by clicking on the screen as the song plays, then pausing and right clicking to edit positions of beats.

 - right click and press backspace to delete beats (in mapping mode), and use the keybinds w,a,s,d to move them around
